message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe will greatly benefit your business operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I propose a price of $20000 for it. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and exceptional customer support to ensure your satisfaction. Please let me know if this aligns with your budget and needs, or if you have any questions.

Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the details you provided. While I'm interested in the product, $20000 is a bit outside my budget. I'd be willing to pay $15000 for it. This would allow me to stay within my budget and still acquire this valuable product.  Let me know if you're open to this offer.
